name: Stuck at Night (Post Jam)
description:
Post Jam version of the game created during 2nd Alakajam (https://alakajam.com/2nd-alakajam/183/stuck-at-night/)

Flashlight is pointed towards mouse cursor. Use left mouse button to fire weapon.

There are 4 types of animals. New ones starts showing after every 30 seconds, and their spawn time is decreased.
